 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶ֫בֶד‎</span> **proper name, masculine** (***servant*** of God = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַבְדְּאֵל‎</span>); — 

**1.** father of Gaal [[Judg.9.26|Judg 9:26]]; [[Judg.9.28|Judg 9:28]]; [[Judg.9.30|Judg 9:30]]; [[Judg.9.31|Judg 9:31]]; [[Judg.9.35|Judg 9:35]] ([[BDB#GFM|GFM]], after [[BDB#Hollenb|Hollenb]]<sup>ThLz 1891, 371</sup> [compare [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]<sup>Ib. 1892, 63</sup>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבֵד‎</span>, as [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup>; see also [[BDB#Gray|Gray]]<sup>Prop. N. 184, 272</sup>); [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ιωβηλ</span>, [[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Αβεδ</span>. 

**2.** a companion of Ezra [[Ezra.8.6|Ezra 8:6]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ωβηθ</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Αμιναδαβ</span>. — For list of Arabic names beginning with <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xli (1887), 724 ff.</sup>, compare also Id<sup>ib, xlii (1888), 486</sup> [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Heid. 2, 2 ff</sup>.
